snippet: A doctor’s appraisal of David Tarloff came to him as he was lying not far from a dead or dying colleague, looking up at his former patient, who was wielding a bloody meat cleaver.
abstract: Dr Kent D Shinbach testifies at trial of David Tarloff, accused of killing psychologist Kathryn Faughey in 2008; his professional appraisal of defendant came to him as he was lying not far from his dead or dying colleague, looking up at his former patient, who was wielding a bloody meat cleaver.
lead_paragraph: A doctor’s appraisal of David Tarloff came to him as he was lying not far from a dead or dying colleague, looking up at his former patient, who was wielding a bloody meat cleaver.

headline.seo: Psychiatrist, Also a Victim, Recalls David Tarloff’s Actions on Night of Therapist’s Murder
headline.main: Psychiatrist, Also Victimized, Tells of Attack by Defendant
headline.print_headline: Psychiatrist, Also Victimized, Tells of Attack by Defendant
